com.force.sdk.springsecurity
Class BaseSpringSecurityIntegrationTest

java.lang.Object
  com.force.sdk.test.util.BaseContainerTest
      com.force.sdk.springsecurity.BaseSpringSecurityIntegrationTest
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseEndToEndTest, LoginRedirectionTest
public abstract class BaseSpringSecurityIntegrationTest
extends com.force.sdk.test.util.BaseContainerTest

This is the base class for all spring security integration tests. This class will deploy an application that implements spring security to a web container.
